Sentencas: A solid oxide fuel cell type reactor was tested for producing ethane and ethene as well as electric power by direct oxidation of methane.
Titulo: Design of electrode for solid oxide fuel cells reactor

Sentencas: The design strategy of an anode catalyst was proposed.
Titulo: Design of electrode for solid oxide fuel cells reactor

Sentencas: In order to evaluate the activity of surface oxygen species, Temperature Programmed Desorption (TPD) technique and pulse reaction technique were applied.
Titulo: Design of electrode for solid oxide fuel cells reactor

Sentencas: The designed anode catalyst was La1.8Al0.2O3 with Yttria Stabilized Zirconia (YSZ) as a solid electrolyte and La0.85S0.15MnO3 as a cathode.
Titulo: Design of electrode for solid oxide fuel cells reactor

Sentencas: The designed fuel cell type reaction system (air/La0.85Sr0.15MnO3/YSZ/La1.8Al0.2O3/methane) produced both ethene and ethane and electric power effectively.
Titulo: Design of electrode for solid oxide fuel cells reactor

Sentencas: From the viewpoint of energy conversion, this can be regarded as CO2 free combustion of methane.
Titulo: Design of electrode for solid oxide fuel cells reactor

Sentencas: The nebulizer method, one of the direct preparation methods of fine powders from a mist of solution of raw materials, was proposed for the efficient preparation of the electrode structure.
Titulo: Design of electrode for solid oxide fuel cells reactor
